results.title: Mechanistic insight into the role of metformin in Alzheimer's disease.
results.text_hl: It has been described that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ employs multiple mechanisms to improve cognition and @DISEASE_Memory_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory impairment@@@ in pre-clinical @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ models, including reduction of hippocampal @GENE_APP @GENE_351 @@@amyloid-beta@@@ (@GENE_APP @GENE_351 @@@Abeta@@@) plaque and @<m>DISEASE_Diffuse_Neurofibrillary_Tangles_with_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055956 @@@neurofibrillary tangles@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diffuse_Neurofibrillary_Tangles_with_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055956 @@@NFTs@@@) load, suppression of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, amelioration of @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ and oxidative stress, restriction of apoptotic @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal death@@@, and induction of neurogenesis.

citations.NLM: Sanati M, Aminyavari S, Afshari AR, Sahebkar A. Mechanistic insight into the role of metformin in Alzheimer's disease. Life Sci. 2022 Feb 15;291():120299. PMID: 34999113
citations.BibTeX: @article{34999113, title={Mechanistic insight into the role of metformin in Alzheimer's disease.}, author={Sanati M and Aminyavari S and Afshari AR and Sahebkar A}, journal={Life Sci}, volume={291}, pages={120299}}

results.title: Neuroprotective and Cardiometabolic Role of Vitamin E: Alleviating Neuroinflammation and Metabolic Disturbance Induced by AlCl3 in Rat Models
results.text_hl: Group 3 received treatment I, consisting of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ at a dosage of 100 mg/kg/day.

citations.NLM: Jabeen K, Rehman K, Akash MSH, Nadeem A, Mir TM. Neuroprotective and Cardiometabolic Role of Vitamin E: Alleviating Neuroinflammation and Metabolic Disturbance Induced by AlCl3 in Rat Models Biomedicines. 2023 Sep 4;11(9):. PMID: 37760893
